actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to offer women nominated by Members of the United States Senate and House of Representatives scholarships for training in the Reserve Officers' Training Corps.

summary.text: Authorizes four-year scholarships for women to participate in the senior division of the Reserve Officers' Training Corps. Requires that such scholarships be in an amount sufficient to pay tuition, fees, books, and reasonable living expenses. Provides that each Senator and Representative shall be entitled to nominate at least one candidate for such scholarships. Sets eligibility requirements for such candidates.

titles.title: A bill to offer women nominated by Members of the United States Senate and House of Representatives scholarships for training in the Reserve Officers' Training Corps.
